name: Severe Weather Indices

screenshots.caption: chance of tornadoes in florida today

short_description: I originally made this for myself but decided to share it with fellow weather enthusiasts. It allows you to easily view severe weather indices from Unisys and displays the related SPC's Skew-T for comparison to help you see which stations have the potential for severe weather.  This is my first C# project I've written. This is for the US only. Remember there are no magic numbers, and there are always going to be exceptions to the rule. Conditions can always change, and you must evaluate the atmosphere as a whole and check CAP/CIN. Remember to check upstream stations and consider advection. See here http://www.spc.noaa.gov/exper/mesoanalysis/help/begin.html and here http://www.theweatherprediction.com/ for more info about the indices.
summary: display weather indices from unisys & spc upper air data
